alert.note: Alert for Adams; Buffalo; Hall; Kearney (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 23 at 1:27AM CDT until July 23 at 2:00AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: The National Weather Service in Hastings has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Adams County in south central Nebraska... Northeastern Kearney County in south central Nebraska... Southeastern Buffalo County in south central Nebraska... Southwestern Hall County in south central Nebraska... * Until 200 AM CDT. * At 126 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Kenesaw, or 17 miles east of Kearney, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Kenesaw, Prosser and Juniata. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 288 and 297. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Hastings. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
